theme.title: Syncopation (4)
theme.para: In this lesson we continue with syncopation. We are going to practice the following rhythmic patterns:

score.music: (score (vers 1.5) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C) (time 2 4 noVisible) (spacer 20) (n a4 e g+)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-) (spacer 20) (barline double) (spacer 20) (n a4 e)(n a4 q)(n a4 q)(n a4 e) (spacer 20) (barline end) )))

theme.para: Again, syncopation is achieved by starting the first beat with an eighth note. The following quarter notes are placed off-beat, and so the accent (start of the note sound) does not coincide with the start of the beat.

part.title: Listen and take notice of the differences
part.para: Listen to each measure and pay attention to the newly introduced patterns:

score.music: (score (vers 1.5) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C) (time 3 4) (n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-) (barline simple) (n a4 e g+)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-) (barline simple) (n a4 e g+)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e l g-)(n a4 e g+)(n a4 e g-) (barline simple) (n a4 e)(n a4 q)(n a4 q)(n a4 e) (barline end) )))
